title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When the font size of a label is modified, the height of the label does not change right away. It should adjust according to the new font size.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Edit the font size of the label to be "18 points".
OB: The height of the label remains the same after modifying the font size.
EB: The height of the label should adjust to accommodate the new font size.
SR:
1. Add a label.
2. Edit the font size of the label to be "18 points" and observe the height change.
